alert.note: Alert for Chase (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chase County through 945 PM MDT... At 859 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Champion, or near Imperial. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Area A Campground, Center Dam Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
